@graph.name: Galaxy Intro Short
@graph.description:
A short introduction to Galaxy

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [A short introduction to Galaxy](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/introduction/tutorials/galaxy-intro-short/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
